info.name: Singing Machine
info.narration: -> #0(이)가 작업을 시작하러 성냥팔이 소녀의 방에 들어갑니다
-> [ {소녀는 #0의 눈치를 보며 구석으로 숨어버립니다.}, {#0의 반응을 살피던 소녀는 이내 벽 뒤로 물러섭니다.}, {소녀는 구석에 자리를 잡은 뒤 #0가 하는 일을 물끄러미 관찰합니다.}, {소녀는 낯선 이에 겁을 먹었는지, 구석진 곳으로 향합니다.}, ]
-> 청소 작업이 성공적으로 끝난 것 같네요. 소녀는 풀이 죽은 표정입니다.
info.desc: "The machine takes the shape of a long cylinder. By the look of it, it may look like a simple grinder but the existence of the thing’s own ‘will’ fills the criteria of Illutionite. When approached (extra experiments are needed to determine how many meters the perimeter actually is) or touched, the Illutionite ‘operates’ and with a strong suctioning power, pulls in a nearby subject inside its body. Afterwards, the body’s fan shuts and the Illutionite works on the task. The task takes approximately 5 minutes. After a few experiments, we have concluded that the Illutionite desires the result of ‘music’ from this interaction. Employees are needed to fulfill that specific need every once in a while in order to prevent the creature’s stress levels from rising."

observe.observe_sub: "Employee M2543 : “I was supposed to be sent in alone. The Illutionite looked like nothing much, something like a machine used in a factory, it didn’t even react to anything." "But that day, [Redacted] insisted that we had to go there. The ‘Pale Horse’ had responded to something specifically he had said, he repeated that a lot." "I didn’t think ‘Pale Horse’ was thinking about [Redacted] when it responded. Most of the Illutionites I take care of are tame." "Also I’m very lucky. I thought that day would be the same. (Omitted)"

"[Redacted] closely observed the Illutionite. I just wanted to write the report quickly and get out, but he was thinking differently." "He was sure; there wouldn’t be an Illutionite that doesn’t have special powers. I warned him not to get too close, but [Redacted] took one step closer." "And suddenly the thing came to life, opened its lid and swallowed him whole. Literally swallowed him."
"The lid closed and a loud noise came from the inside of the creature, there was no way of knowing what was happening, but I was too terrified to do anything." "(Omitted)"

"In the dark, I realized, the thing was playing an instrument. By crushing and cutting [Redacted]’s body, it was creating a melody." "As I was contemplating my horrific realizations, the lid opened again." "Bits and pieces of [Redacted] were in there. So little that you had to wonder, what happened to the rest. (Omitted)"
